issue.title: Laser subscription in vrc_task_2 causes slow-down

content.raw: btw I think this is more of a Gazebo problem, not a drcsim problem given that triangle meshes with much higher resolution don't cause this problem. (although it might also be possible to solve it through drcsim by switching to GPU based lidar but this wouldn't solve the underlying problem with using lidar + heightmap).
